result.execSummary:
All charges against Jorge E Morales in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jorge E Morales is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jorge E Morales

records.addlTxt: Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared along w/Atty Wm. Michel.  VRC.  Case is resolved.  State moves to dismiss the criminal charge; ordinance efiled for DC.  Deft pleads guilty to the DC ordinance; found guilty by the Court.  Deft fined $100 plus costs.  90 DTP.  In default, 5 days work crew or 5 days KCJ.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person pro se.  SPD has not appointed counsel to date.  Status set for 5/5/22 @ 9am.  Deft does NOT need a spanish interpreter
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
No violent contact and no discussion of case w/ Jorge M-R, Teresa T-F, Daniel M-T

133PM    State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Spanish interpreter, Leo Martin, appeared in court.  Victim J.M. w/ Spanish interpreter Reme Bashi.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 01:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Signature Bond continued.  DE states he does not need interpreter - Leo does sit with DE today.  ts

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Jorge M - R, Teresa T-F, Daniel M-T.  The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim's (ALL) residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

01:41 PM  
  Attorney Zachary Brost appeared for the State.  Deft in custody but no appearance - Covid.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.  Temporary $750  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).     jk
and witness list filed by the State
